text: Any fan of SRV is OK with me.....oh, he plays some good stuff as well.   I don't give praise  easily but that's because I am old enough to have seen and heard what I considered to be the crem de la crem : Hendricks, Zappa, Beck, Clapton, BBK etc - also Walter Trout, Johnny Marr...the list is endless because talent, ability, virtuosity, commitment is a mix that can be found in different combinations and degrees in a lot of people - right place at the right time BEFORE the right person.   This guy has his own style and I hope it is appreciated by enough people for him to feel "connected" and motivated to never give up..

text:
Finally the new "matured" (think "fine wine" ) John Mayer!
I've been listening to your music since you were "knee-high to a grasshopper", awaiting for the transition to full-on adult John Mayer and it appears you are there!  Still the sweet emotional John, but matured and touching our souls in a pleasantly evolved way - I'm lovin' it!
